description: Designed to be worn under unlined swim shorts, DropTemp Cooling Liner is the first-ever aquatic underwater equipped with the BallPark Pouch. Built to provide chafe-free comfort, this pair is made using an ultra-light micro-mesh that's both quick-dry and quick-drain.
name: Saxx Underwear DropTemp Cooling Mesh Boxer Brief Fly, 5" Inseam - Mens - 3-Pack
